The Talk https://www.takimag.com/article/the_talk_nonblack_version_john_derbyshire/

Violent crime by race
https://i.postimg.cc/ZqdLhtp5/EFF69722-88-FC-4-D94-BAE6-4-BB96973667-E.jpg

https://i.postimg.cc/kX42F2NP/E9394-CC1-E3-BB-4-C2-C-986-B-73-AD03-A65-F78.png

https://x.com/LiberalHivemind/status/1908197552660373653

https://ucr.fbi.gov/crime-in-the-u.s/2011/crime-in-the-u.s.-2011/tables/table-43

Mass shootings https://archive.is/C9MBg

https://mass-shootings.info/index.php?year=2022

Here are the statistics: Blacks have killed about 103,000 more whites than whites have killed blacks over the last 64 years. https://i.postimg.cc/FsMPt2qr/pv-Vf-Cpd-KF2xw.jpg

AI can guess racial categories from heart scans https://theconversation.com/ai-can-guess-racial-categories-from-heart-scans-what-it-means-and-why-it-matters-254416

Pre-Obama America https://x.com/DefiantLs/status/1907894625685409883

How Obama divided the country by race https://x.com/defiyantlyfree/status/1842195395478270077?s=46

69% of black women believe “white people invented slavery.”  As do 53% of black men. https://x.com/TheRabbitHole84/status/1923465683779604931


The majority (67%) of African American youth live in single-parent households https://pmc.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/articles/PMC4245275/


Here's the Inter-racial rape statistics from the US Department of Justice’s National Crime Victimization Survey in 2008.

Number of whites raped by blacks = 19,293

Number of blacks raped by whites = 0

Source: https://www.bjs.gov/content/pub/pdf/cvus08.pdf

Table 42 show inter-racial rape statistics for 2008

The numbers are not perfect because they are extrapolations based on small numbers of reported rapes (in the case of blacks raped by whites) and include verbal as well as physical sex assaults. But it is very clear that there is much more black-on-white than white-on-black rape.

Table 42 also shows inter-racial statistics on "robberies leading to injury" for 2008

inter-racial robberies leading to injury:

Whites injured by blacks while being robbed by blacks = 15,858

Blacks injured by whites while being robbed by whites = 0

A quicker summary of Black against White Crime Statistics: https://imgur.com/a/ZUwNEKN

More info on inter-racial rape. https://www.amren.com/commentary/2017/05/black-on-white-rape-anti-white-racism-crime/

The numbers are from 2008, because when Obama became president, his "Justice Department" stopped releasing the statistics that allowed people to specifically examine the inter-racial violent crime.


Black Man with 3-Year Prison Stint for Prior Stabbing Found NOT GUILTY of Stabbing Victim – Claimed N-Word Excuse https://www.usasupreme.com/new-black-man-with-3-year-prison-stint-for-prior-stabbing-found-not-guilty-of-stabbing-victim-claimed-n-excuse-wins/

29% of Hispanics are being intentionally misclassified as "White" in official Department of Corrections databases. https://x.com/uncorrelated_/status/1991295113344225596

Michael Gerber, NYPD Deputy Commissioner of Legal Matters:

- Database contains over 500 gangs and crews
- 99% of the individuals in the database are people of color
- 96% of shootings were people of color
- 96% shootings victims were people of color
https://x.com/wallstreetapes/status/1915759429347336396?s=46


Black Americans are 5X more likely to murder White Americans than vice versa
https://ucr.fbi.gov/crime-in-the-u.s/2016/crime-in-the-u.s.-2016/tables/expanded-homicide-data-table-3.xls?utm_source=share&utm_medium=ios_app


Black men which account for 6% of the population commit 55.9% of homicides, 830% more than their population share. Black women, on the other hand are striving like never before representing 340% more than their population share of judges. https://x.com/amuse/status/1964433872034082942



Blacks make up 13% of the population. What percentage of murderers are black?

For 2021, Blacks were 60.4%
For 2020, Blacks were 56.6%
For 2019, Blacks were 55.9%
For 2018, Blacks were 54.8%
For 2017, Blacks were 54.2%
For 2016, Blacks were 53.5%
For 2015, Blacks were 53.3%
For 2014, Blacks were 53.0%
https://crime-data-explorer.app.cloud.gov/pages/explorer/crime/shr

The poorest white community in the US doesn’t have the crime or graffiti of most big cities. 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p3O6bKdPLbw

Ya think they might be misrepresenting statistics? https://i.imgur.com/l2Js8fP.jpg
Verify for yourself https://publicsite.dps.texas.gov/SexOffenderRegistry

Ya think? 
https://x.com/iamyesyouareno/status/1964328092643610634

---------——————————-

What will happen to the United States if African Americans disappear?

- US population will decrease by 11.3%;
 - The number of employees will decrease by 1.4%;
 - The number of prisoners will be reduced by 48%;
 - The number of gangs and other criminal groups will be reduced by 53°
 - The country's average IQ will grow by 7.4%, putting the United States i third place in the world, along with Japan;
 - The average score of SAT (2016) will rise to 1100 points (now it is 1000)
 - The number of AIDS patients will be reduced by 65%;
 - The number of patients with chlamydia will decrease by 59%;
 - The number of patients with gonorrhea will decrease by 69%;
 - The number of patients with syphilis will decrease by 57%;
 - The average annual income in the country will rise by more than $ 20,0
 - The number of people living in poverty will be reduced by 54%;
 - The number of homeless people will be reduced by 65%;
 - The number of Welfare recipients will be reduced by 52%;
 - The US Democratic Party will lose 26% of its voters.


There are 10 million police arrested annually, with more than 250,000,000 police interactions with criminal suspects in the US.
https://ucr.fbi.gov/crime-in-the-u.s/2018/crime-in-the-u.s.-2018/topic-pages/persons-arrested

10 unarmed blacks were killed by police in 2019
https://dailycaller.com/2020/06/03/tucker-carlson-police-shootings-genocide/?utm_source=share&utm_medium=ios_app

posts.author: thegatewaybandit
posts.title: WATCH: “The Single Greatest Theft of Taxpayer Dollars Through Welfare Fraud in American History” – Stephen Miller GOES OFF on Somali Fraud in Minnesota, Says State Government is “Fully Complicit” and Will be EXPOSED

link_metadata.description: White House Deputy Chief of Staff Stephen Miller eviscerated the Democrats and Minnesota politicians during a Friday appearance on Fox News with Sean Hannity, declaring the Somali welfare fraud in Minnesota “the single greatest theft of taxpayer dollars through welfare fraud in American history.” “We believe that we have only scratched the very top of the surface of how deep this goes,” Miller said, vowing that the federal government will “make sure that those responsible are held accountable.” “The total bill, the total tab for this, is going to be far beyond the numbers we’ve already seen reported.
link_metadata.title: WATCH: "The Single Greatest Theft of Taxpayer Dollars Through Welfare Fraud in American History" - Stephen Miller GOES OFF on Somali Fraud in Minnesota, Says State Government is "Fully Complicit" and Will be EXPOSED | The Gateway Pundit | by Jordan Conradson

posts.title: Update: Ed Bambas Can Finally Retire. The 88-year-old was forced to go back to working 40 hours a week after he lost his pension to pay for his dying wife’s medical bills. $1.7 million raised after his story goes viral.

quotedTweet.content:
88yr old US veteran had his pension taken away as his wife was sick, he was forced to sell up, and his wife passed.

He's now working 40hrs a week to survive.

Influencers spread his story and his go fund me just surpassed $1.5m 🙏🏻

twitter.content:
Update on 88-year-old Ed Bambas, who was forced to work 40hrs a week as his pension was taken away, when his wife was dying, and he had to sell everything. 

Social media influencer Samuel Weidenhofer started a campaign, the people raised over $1.7 million.

Ed can now retire 🙏🏻
